Arrangement.text:
Worship Team: As a deer pants for flowing streams, So pants my soul for you, O God.
Congregation: My soul thirsts for God, for the living God. When shall I come and appear before God?
Worship Team: My tears have been my food day and night, While they say to me all the day long, “Where is your God?”
Congregation: These things I remember, As I pour out my soul: How I would go with the throng And lead them in procession to the house of God With glad shouts and songs of praise, A multitude keeping festival.
Worship Team: Why are you cast down, O my soul, And why are you in turmoil within me?
Everyone: Hope in God; for I shall again praise him, my salvation and my God.
